newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Bank/Portugal leaves key rates steady, sets repo.
newsitem.headline: Bank/Portugal leaves key rates steady, sets repo.

text.p: The Bank of Portugal said it left key rates unchanged and offered to inject 200 billion escudos of nine-day funds into the money market in a variable rate repurchase pact.
Bids in the repo must be submitted by 1415 GMT. The central bank previously injected repo funds at 6.0 percent.
The absorption rate, used to drain funds from the money market, remains steady at 5.7 percent. The emergency lending rate is unchanged at 7.70 percent.
